abstract: The $15.4 billion Mackenzie Valley project faces two more regulatory hurdles, and in the end, it still may not be built.
snippet: The $15.4 billion Mackenzie Valley project faces two more regulatory hurdles, and in the end, it still may not be built.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON  A long-delayed natural gas pipeline in Western Canada, which has the potential to provide significant amounts of energy to North America, has cleared a crucial hurdle by receiving the endorsement of a Canadian government review panel.

headline.main: Canadian Board Approves Western Gas Pipeline
